resources.string: New item created. Password added to the clipboard.
This item already exist, please change the name
Please give your item a name and a password
Do you really want to delete this item?
The item has been successfully deleted
Indicates if all the items should be hidden on the home screen
Please provide a password in order to encrypt the file
Oops! An error occurred while exporting your passwords. Please try again.
The file exported with this option will generate readable text that could expose your password security
The file exported with this option will be encrypted and only readable from the YSNP app.
You can import items from csv and ysnp file.
We detected an encrypted file please provide us the password to decrypt it.
Please review the items you want to import.
Sorry we were unable to import items from this file.
Please select a file to import
Please provide a password to decrypt the file
Please select at least one item to import
Use the search field above to find items.
You have no item yet, use the button below to add one.
This app cannot be used without a biometric setup. Please go to your settings to add one.
In order to use this application you need to add a lock screen to your device.\nPlease go to Settings > Security > Screen lock to setup one.
An error occurred while changing the app theme
No header has been found in this file so we can\'t import items
Do you really want to delete all the items?
All items have been successfully deleted
In order to connect your phone and your computer we need to use your camera to scan the YSNP desktop QR code.
Unable to read the QR code, please make sure you are scanning the one from the YouShallNotPass desktop app
You are now connected with the YouShallNotPass Desktop app!
You can directly send your items to your computer using the YouShallNotPass desktop app: https://github.com/jorisfavier/YouShallNotPass-desktop/releases
Data successfully sent to the desktop app!
We were unable to send your data to the desktop app. Try to sync your mobile and desktop app together and try again.
Fill forms using the YouShallNotPass data
An error occurred. Are your phone and computer connected to the same wifi?
In order to use this app you need to setup a biometric authentication.
Unfortunately your device is not compatible with this app. To properly secure your passwords you need a device allowing biometric authentication.
